config.task_description: A heartwarming story about Labubu, a little girl with dark hair and blue eyes. She feels sad and excluded when she isn't invited to a birthday party that all her friends are attending. Determined not to miss out, she disguises herself in a costume to crash the party. Upon arrival, she sees her friends in costumes too, only to discover the party was actually a surprise birthday celebration for her all along.
config.style_details: soft colors, expressive characters, cute and vibrant.

script.title: The Monster in the Party Hat
script.premise: Labubu, feeling left out of a secret party, decides to crash the event in a disguise, only to discover the secrecy was for her own surprise birthday celebration.

characters.name: Labubu
characters.visual_traits: A small girl (approx. 6-7 years old). Shoulder-length messy dark hair, large expressive blue eyes, rosy cheeks. Usually wears oversized sweaters and striped tights.

characters.name: Milo
characters.description: Energetic, usually terrible at keeping secrets.
characters.visual_traits: A boy with glasses and messy blonde hair. Wears a dinosaur t-shirt.

characters.name: The Friends
characters.description: Diverse group of children in the background.
characters.visual_traits: Distinct by colorful clothes and eventual costumes.

characters.name: Voice
characters.description: An unseen character speaking from inside the house.

characters.name: All Friends
characters.description: The entire group of friends speaking in unison.

frames.description: Labubu on the swing, looking curious and slightly hopeful.
frames.caption: It started on a Tuesday. The whispering.

frames.description: Labubu hops off the swing and approaches the group. The group immediately stops talking and looks guilty. Milo hides a colorful envelope behind his back.

rows.visual_description: A wide, establishing shot of a whimsical school playground. Soft sunlight filters through large oak trees. In the foreground, Labubu sits on a swing, looking back over her shoulder. In the background, a group of her friends (including Milo) are huddled in a circle, whispering excitedly.

frames.description: In the cafeteria, the friends are giggling at a table. Labubu walks up with her tray, but they suddenly get quiet.
frames.caption: It happened at lunch.

frames.description: Walking home from school. The friends are walking ahead in a group, laughing. Labubu is ten paces behind, head down, kicking a pebble.
frames.caption: And all the way home.

rows.visual_description: A montage of exclusion. The colors should be slightly cooler/bluer here to reflect Labubu's sadness.

frames.description: Labubu is lying on her bed, staring at the ceiling. A tear rolls down her cheek.

dialog.text: They're having a party. I know it. And I'm the only one not invited.

frames.description: Close up on Labubu’s face. Her expression shifts from sad to a cute, furrowed-brow frown. Determination sets in.

dialog.text: Well, I like parties too. And I’m going.

rows.visual_description: Interior of Labubu’s bedroom. It is cozy but feels lonely right now. Blue moonlight spills in from the window.

frames.description: Labubu tossing a feather boa and a pirate hat over her shoulder.

dialog.text: If I go as me, they'll send me home.

frames.description: She holds up a fuzzy purple fabric and a cardboard box.

dialog.text: But if I go as a *Mystery Guest*... they'll never know!

rows.visual_description: Bright, energetic morning light. The scene is chaotic and vibrant. Labubu is rummaging through a large wooden chest labeled 'Dress Up.'

frames.description: Labubu painting a cardboard box with green and purple polka dots. She has paint on her nose. (SFX: SQUEAK SQUEAK - Marker sounds)
She is taping fuzzy ears onto the box. (SFX: RIIIIIP - Tape sound)

rows.visual_description: A crafting montage. The background should be abstract swirls of creativity—scissors, glue, and glitter floating in the air.

frames.description: Labubu stands in front of a mirror. She is wearing a homemade 'Swamp Monster' costume. It’s a boxy head with mismatched eyes and a fuzzy purple body suit. It is clearly homemade and adorable.

rows.visual_description: The reveal of the costume. It is a full-body shot.

frames.description: Labubu (in costume) marching down the sidewalk. Her blue eyes are visible through the eyeholes of the mask.
frames.caption: Operation Party Crash is a go.

rows.visual_description: Labubu stepping out of her front door into the twilight. The sky is a mix of purple and orange.

frames.description: Labubu hiding behind a bush in the front yard, looking at the house.

dialog.text: Look at them. Having fun. Without me.

frames.description: Through the window, she sees Milo wearing a superhero cape. Another friend is dressed as a fairy.

dialog.text: Wait... it's a COSTUME party?! Now I really have to go in!

rows.visual_description: Exterior of Milo’s house. It is nighttime now. The house is glowing with warm yellow light. Silhouettes of kids are visible in the windows.

frames.description: Labubu’s gloved hand reaching for the doorbell. The doorbell glows softly. (SFX: DING DONG)
The door creaks open slightly. It’s dark inside the hallway.

rows.visual_description: Tension building. The perspective is from Labubu's point of view (through the mask eyeholes).

frames.description: Labubu steps onto the welcome mat. She puffs out her chest to look brave.
She walks through the archway into the main living room. The room is pitch black.

rows.visual_description: Labubu stepping into the hallway. The lighting is dramatic—dark foreground, bright light coming from the living room ahead.

frames.description: The lights flip on. Streamers and confetti explode from the sides. Milo and all the friends jump out from behind sofas and tables. They are all in costumes. A banner hangs across the room: HAPPY BIRTHDAY LABUBU!

rows.visual_description: A sudden explosion of light and color. This should be the brightest, most vibrant panel in the comic.

frames.description: The friends stop cheering and look confused at the purple swamp monster standing in the doorway.
Labubu pulls the boxy mask off her head. Her dark hair is messy, and her blue eyes are wide with shock.

rows.visual_description: Confusion and realization. The mood shifts from shock to warmth.

frames.description: Milo runs over and hugs Labubu. The other friends crowd around.

dialog.text: We thought you weren't coming! We tried to keep it a secret all week!

frames.description: A friend hands Labubu a party hat to put on top of her monster costume.

dialog.text: Forget you? It's YOUR party, silly!

rows.visual_description: The emotional climax. Soft, warm colors.

frames.description: Labubu is laughing, wearing her monster suit body but with her face visible and a party hat on. She is blowing out candles on a cake. (Text on cake: Happy Birthday!)
frames.caption: Best. Party. Crash. Ever.

rows.visual_description: The happy ending. A wide shot of the party in full swing.
